Text:
Torrent contains only mods, no Wrye Bash or other programms.
All mods are renamed according to guide.
Please note! Install only using STEP original guide. Some of the mods require BCF files wich you have to make manually (in this pack there are, however, BCF`s from STEP installation guide)

This is pretty cool of you. Thumbs up.

What would be even cooler is a pre-packaged patched and STEPed Skyrim torrent tho I realize that'd be a bit more work, it would make an amazing base install.
Nevermind. Found out those were the lite textures.

All mods are chosen according to this guide http://wiki.step-project.com/STEP:2.2.5

Check "Baseline" column
And all you have to do is overwrite everything in the Skyrim Mods folder and install using Wrye Bash right?
Not really, there is few mods that require some tweaking (create BFC for them). You have to do this manually, check guide
OK figured it out. Keep uploading these:)

It normally takes an UNGODLY amount of time to gather these mods and assemble them into STEP so it's really nice to find it all nicely assembled into a single package. Can't be done on the official channels since they are too concerned that one of the mod's authors will complain or something. 

Anyway, going to wait until a Step 2.5.6 bundle is assembled since they seemed to make some rather noteworthy changes.
